root.name: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? & Friends
root.description: OverviewAre You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? Friends is a trivia game show game developed and published by Ludia Inc. for the iPhone, iPad, and Android platforms. Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? Friends is based on the Jeff Foxworthy hosted TV game show called Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader?GameplayAre You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? Friends features fast trivia gameplay in which players try and answer as many questions as possible in a set time limit. Players scores can be compared to other players online, and more features unlock with a connected Facebook account.Facebook ConnectivityAre You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? Friends features the ability to link the game to a players Facebook account. Once a Facebook account is linked there are a number of social features such as leaderboards and cheats that become available.
